channel.title: Call Of Duty 4 modern warfare - Xbox 360 - Christmas
channel.description: Im getting a 360 for christmas wit like 4 games i get to pik n 1 is that cod 4 mdwf..! i love it played it on ps3 at cuzes house it awesome what u getting!?! Have fun lol

item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:11, topic:158906”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=216472.msg1885367#msg1885367 date=1195410980]

Clothes and GTA4 if its out

GTA4 came out here (england) october the 2* (can’t remember the exact date) for ps3, not sure about xbox 360 but i imagine if they released it on ps3 and have already said they are releasing it on xbox 360 i can’t see them not of already released it on 360.
[/quote]
Whoa there! You had you head up your arse for the past few months?[/quote]
I probably have, i havnt bothered with any games consoles or anything for ages - just i have got a recent argos catalog and it says its out in that lol.
